title: Project-Pages
desc: A Jekyll based scientific blogging tool, easily accessible to the non-coder researcher through heavily opinionated templates, while preserving the freedom of the code savvy user to customize all functionality.

title: Multivariate Polynomial Regression
desc: Standard basis polynomial regression on multidimensional data. Automatically performs Leave-One-Out Cross-Validation using the Sherman-Morrison rank one update formula.

title: PyMKS
desc: A novel tool that uses techniques from physics, machine learning, regression analysis, signal processing, and spatial statistics to solve multiscale materials science problems.

title: Spatial Correlation Toolbox
desc: Computes spatial correlations of gigantic datasets. Uses memory mapping to operate on a chunk of the data at a time. Can calculate convolution, correlation and Pearson correlation in 3D.

title: Interactive Spatial Statistics
desc: Online demo written in R using Shiny framework.
